1111318822739476482.text: My hunch is that for most people flat-earthism is more an ideological position than an intellectual one.https://twitter.com/neiltyson/status/1111295662920888320 …

1111319993449361409.text: But is your hunch more of intellectual hunch? Or an ideological one? Does your ideology have an intellectual basis? Are your intellectual positions without ideology?  (Why yes, I have in fact been accused of pedantry from time to time. Why do you ask?)
